title: "Noida man wrongly identified as “wanted criminal” by Abu Dhabi airport’s facial recognition system"
excerpt: "A Noida-based businessman travelling to Switzerland was wrongly detained by the UAE authorities in Abu Dhabi on October 11, 2022, reported Hindustan Times. As per the report, the airport authorities claimed Praveen Kumar’s face matched with a ‘wanted criminal’ as per their face recognition software (FRS)."
